name: Learn: Shapes
description:
With Learn: Shapes your kid will be able to learn the basic shapes. 

Includes two modes:

1. Learn

  • Touch the shapes to hear the pronunciation
  • Spelling for shapes are also shown

2. Challenge

  • Your kid will have to select the correct answer out of three options.
  • Challenge types:
  1. Match - Match the shape spelling with the corresponding image.
  • Shapes to match can be configured in settings

Different languages available. (Can be configured in settings)

Let us know about other learning activities you would like to add!!
